customize.text: Adventure Challenge: Fuel to the Fire

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Many are those who roam the world looking for new cooking ingredients. Why, I've heard of one such master chef who encountered the Fatui while at Mt. Hulao on just such a search...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Chef Mao" card. When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Pyro.</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: "Chef Mao" can grant you extra Elemental DIce when you play Food Cards!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Agente dei Fatui di Pyro
customize.desc:
Agente Lama del regolamento

"Non si scappa dai debiti, che si sia vivi o altrimenti"

customize.name: Sacerdotessa degli specchi
customize.desc:
Emissaria dello specchio, Sacerdotessa di Snezhnaya

Tutti i segreti verranno nascosti all'interno dello specchio della luminosità sfolgorante...

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Chef Mao
customize.desc:
Chef Mao, Gourmet ingegnoso

"Ci preoccupiamo solo di preparare il cibo più delizioso che si possa immaginare, usando ingredienti di tutti i giorni, sapori amati da tutti e una cucina veramente eccellente."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The boss of Wanmin Restaurant recounts the tales of adventure that his customers once discussed as they dined in his restaurant. These tales serve as the perfect beginning for an Adventure Challenge...

customize.name: Fungostro Cresta di giada
customize.desc:
Fungostro Cresta di giada, Signore dei Miconoidi

Se rimani in silenzio e ascolti attentamente, potrai sentire il suono del regnante dei Fungoidi che ispeziona il suo territorio...
